hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors
### A utility. This one you'll need to edit the PHP file and enter wich taxon file you want to process. #php gen_higherClass.php
### This will add higherClassification in taxon.tab and rebuild the DwCA. With carry-over of other extensions. #php dwca_utility.php _ wikipedia_en_traits Y
### This use gnparser one name at a time. Not entire file. #php run_gnparser_dwca.php _ '{"resource_id": "wikipedia_en_traits"}' #php run_gnparser_dwca.php _ '{"resource_id": "wikipedia_en_traits-with-higherClassification"}'
### Start matching taxa #php match_taxa_2DH.php _ '{"resource_id": "Brazilian_Flora"}' php match_taxa_2DH.php _ '{"resource_id": "wikipedia_en_traits-with-higherClassification"}'
